Title: I Had a Dream
Plot: While preparing for his big wedding day, Dexter has to figure out a way to remove Miguel from his life for good. In the meantime, Rita has troubles of her own, when Syl reveals that Miguel has been seeing one of his old flames. Debra finds a new clue that brings her even closer to catching the Skinner.
GuestStars: Jason Manuel Olazabal, Desmond Harrington, Jimmy Smits, Tasia Sherel, Kristin Dattilo, David Ramsey, Jane McLean
